catalysts.thesis: Polymarket odds for a January 2026 Fed rate cut have collapsed to ~12%, with 88% favoring a 'Hold'. This hawkish repricing (removing ease expectations) presents a short-term liquidity headwind for equities and crypto.
catalysts.catalyst_details: Federal Reserve Open Market Committee (FOMC) meeting in January 2026. Data from Dec 30 confirms market consensus has shifted to a 'Pause' (Hold) scenario.
catalysts.prediction_market: Polymarket: 'Fed decision in January?' Odds: 88% No Change, 12% Cut. Vol: ~$101M.
catalysts.recency_proof: CryptoTicker Analysis (Dec 30, 2025): 'Polymarket Traders Expect the Fed to Pause Rates in 2026' - confirming 87-88% hold probability.
catalysts.risk: Unexpected Dovish Pivot: If the Fed cuts 25bps (12% implied probability), shorts would be squeezed.

catalysts.thesis: Hawaii's 11% tax on cruise ship gross fares and lodging officially takes effect Jan 1, 2026, after a US District Court denied the industry's motion for an injunction. This creates immediate margin compression or pricing friction for Hawaii routes.
catalysts.catalyst_details: Effective Date: Jan 1, 2026. Legal Ruling: District Judge denied injunction Dec 23, reported extensively in legal/tax journals Dec 30.
catalysts.prediction_market: Legal Ruling (Determinative): Injunction Denied (Probability 100%). Market must now price in the active tax liability.
catalysts.recency_proof: VitalLaw (Dec 30, 2025): 'Hawaii... Court Declines to Halt Implementation of New Tax on Cruise Ship Accommodations.'
catalysts.risk: Pass-through Elasticity: If cruise lines successfully pass the 11% fee to customers without reducing booking volumes, earnings impact may be negligible.

catalysts.thesis: Mortgage rates have dropped to their lowest level of 2025 (<5.5%) as of Dec 31, providing a tailwind for homebuilders heading into the Q1 2026 spring selling season despite the Fed's pause.
catalysts.catalyst_details: Year-End Rate Data (Dec 31, 2025): 30-year fixed rates breached 2025 lows, improving affordability optics for 2026.
catalysts.prediction_market: Polymarket Proxy: 'Fed Rates 2026' (Pause Consensus) stabilizes the long end of the curve, preventing volatility spikes.
catalysts.recency_proof: CBS MoneyWatch (Dec 31, 2025): 'Mortgage rates fall to their lowest level in 2025... less than 5.5%.'
catalysts.risk: Yield Spike: If the 10-year Treasury yield rebounds aggressively in Jan 2026, mortgage rates will reverse, crushing builder sentiment.
